name: FPS Template Demo
description:
A demo for the unreal Engine Marketplace Pack Procedural FPS Template (W/In-game Gun customization).

Marketplace Link.

An easy to use data-driven FPS Template that contains :

  • Full FPS pawn system with fully procedural animations.
  • Fully customizable weapon system.
  • Data driven in-game weapon customization.

Support

  • Email : ahmedabuajamiah367@gmail.com
  • Discord : Abu-Al3ajam11#4880
NOTE :  This is NOT a full game or meant to be a game, this is just a demo for an Unreal Engine marketplace asset-pack.
